WRITING.TEXT: Hi men ( first sorry my english is bad) i don't have advice for you (not today at least) i feel bad today but if it's ok for you we can just talk. so what's wrong? what are all the things you lived that make you feel that way ?

Hi men same age than you you don't have pity i can understand.i don't deserve any too i mean most of my days (if i'm not faking a silly face with a happy smile) i really want to kill myself but hey! I'm just a pussy! I don't have the courage. When i look at my friend who tried... Well i think he is brave (even if now he is a special school for "people like him". Anyway it's exams now and i feel like shit. I don't work at all. I try but what's the point? I'll finish by killing myself someday so why live ? I don't even know if i'm really depressed. But i'm sad for 2 years now and i never talked about it to anyone. I'm alone in my sorrow. I think a lot of people just think i'm someone who don't worry too much and i can't blame them i never said i was sad. So just to say you're not alone and if you wanna talk i'm ready i have all the night! ( Sorry for the faults my english is bad)

Yeah i feel so too but most of the time i say myself: "come on men ! You're not that sad! Look at the people on this forum !they are all sadder than you! Stop being a pussy you little piece of shit!! Stop being depressed ! Do like everybody !!!!" Actually it's more the "part" inside me who tell me that. You know this part who tell when you're alone that it could better for everyone if you killed yourself. I'm trying to get better but currently everything is worse than before... Sorry if you wanted someone for saying you" Be happy ! Life is good just trust yourself!" and these kind of things i really wanna believe in. But today i can't help you i just needed to write how bad i felt but i know that talking always help so i can do this with you it would help me either. Sooo... How did you get here? what's your story bro? (Sorry for the faults my english is bad)

Yeah i never thought about it. Still there are things in my life i know caused my depression. All my childhood i was alone(i didn't had friends) with my dreams, my stories i created,... Now i'm depressed i don't really know either when did it start but i know that i'm still sad because i don't speak about it to my rare friends. I'd like to do it but how to begin? I just can't do it and i just pray that some day i'll have the motivation to work again, to wake me up,... Currently i make fake smile and a lot of people think i'm never worried about anything. I'm here today because if i didn't maybay i would have the courage to kill myself (It was a difficult day). I never did because i'm not brave enough (and what would happen if i fail? That's the case of one of my friend). I think it's great you won't kill yourself because i'm sure it's not solution even if sometimes we think there are not other choices.

It depends of you men i have some friends now but it's only because i make fake smile i'm faking happiness and i'm sure it's not the solution yet i have some great friends and now i should talk to them but i just can't it's stupid right?
I understand no problems i don't always wanna speak either Hope you'll someday get better !

I play undertale to stay alive dunno if it's better i told myself "don't kill yourself until the next game of the creator arrive" That sounds stupid but it works. I never had a gf but i 'd like to have sombody with me. Just someone i could tell how i feel but i'm alone (i mean i have friends but talk with them about my depression looks impossible.) It's great you write how you feel i often do it on other forum ( it's my first day on this forum) and it really helps me i hope you're feeling better and it's not a judgment but hate humanity doesn't help (i mean a part of me hate every human on this earth but i know it's stupid when i just read the posts of this forum) you'd better start to like people ( at least just a little bit) because i'm sure that be alone is useless to find happiness (if it exists)

Sleep is the only moment of the day where i'm happy too. You know i live the exact same situation than you and i'm sure i'll fail at these f****** exams and i'm such a pussy i'm not even enough brave to killmyself because i know it would hurt my family. So i stay alive knowing that one day i'll finish to finally erase me of this pathetic world...
If it was a problem i would be dead :)

Me too men when i read stuff like "life make you happy! You JUST have to smile at the life and life'll smile you in retourne!" That's sounds easy ! .... Well not for me i always fake happiness to my family and friends until i crack (there if i'm not alone in 30 sec i really could collapse and cry like a baby). STILL i don't lose Hope i believe someday i'll be brave enough to talk (to real people) about my depression and i hope THERE it'll be ok. Just to say i'm sure there is a way to pass trough depression.

Men i understand you if i found a way to kill myself without pain or without hurt my family i would do it. Yeah i understand it looks an easy to stop being sad i mean i wanna kill myself too but i'm not brave enough. (first sorry for the faults my english is bad) Nobody really wanna die i mean instict will often stop you so you need to be with her and she needs to know that you'll always be there for her not to judge her she just needs someone to hug someone listening and to help her with stuff like do her shopping,... Only if she asks you. When you're depressed you don't need someone that tell What can i do ?? Are you alright??? I'll call you when i arrive Home alright !!??? I mean it's nice but you'll be rejected now if she is about to kill herself then..... Well i hate it but you need to do something ! I really wouldn't like it if one of my friend tell everybody that i'm planning to kill myself but if you do nothing you'll always have regrets and it seems a bit selfish but it is a too big responsibility you can't handle. Then if you talk together and that she says she really wanna do it and that she has no regrets then you need to be there for here so you can help her if she changes her mind. But remember : don't judge her it is the worst thing you can do! I hope it helped let us now if she gets better :)

If you need to talk do it don't doubt so much and you look to be an amazing girl when i read you' Please stop thinking about suicide (i know it is hard i don't always succeed i often spend days with dark ideas) Finally being yourself with your friends is much better than fake happiness like i do it's horrible because sometimes people are angry because i'm lazy and these kind of stuff. Thanks for answering so quickly :) Ok so I guess I should first see a psychiatrist ? I mean I understand they do a different job but it's better to start with a psychiatrist ? And of course later I'd see both if I see I need it.

I also cut myself (for three years now) The physical pain make me "forget" about the sorrow for a few seconds so I truly enjoy it. But after doing it I always feel worse than before doing it so I'm currently trying to stop which is difficult when you did it during 3 years... So my friend, stop right now ok ? It sucks to cut yourself. I know it because I'm still doing it. You have to stop before you'll get addicted. I truly thought I would never be addicted to, that I totally controlled it, but it's not true.... There will be some days where, even if you don't want to, you'll finally cut yourself. So try to stop now while it's not too difficult. Try to do something else when you truly want to cut yourself like playing with something (a spinning top or something....). It really can be a silly thing but It'll always be better than cuttting yourself. Hang in there men. I truly hope you'll get out of this shit. (Sorry for the faults my English is bad)
Just the thoughtful don't worry. Whatever I'm a coward so I could never kill myself.
Ok I guess I'll do that.( Just need to find the courage to talk about it with real people...) Thanks for helping me :)

No you didn't fail bro. If she did this it only means she thought it was the better way to forget the mental pain (actually that's why I do it so I think that's it but I can be wrong). Now as a partner you need to be there for her and to let her know that she can count on you. So you'll be able to make her understand it's useless to cut herself. I mean it's a lot easier to stop at the beginning than stop after 3 years (which is my case). So yeah good luck bro I know you can help (Just final thing don't judge her for what she did : she would only feel guilty and want to do it more) (And sorry for the faults my English is bad)

Yeah I know how you feel : this feels good for a moment, then you feel bad, then you are scared of being addicted because you did that 3 times this week. Self harm feels good even if it's little and that it doesn't bleed and that there are no scars after it. But it's still something bad and it needs to be cured before the addiction get too strong :/ You truly have to get help quickly even if you think it's not that bad. Do not like me : don't think it will pass. It will not. So talk about it with a friend, with someone of your family, your psychiatrist (if you have one) or with people on forums. You need help bro. I'm here if you need. Sorry my English sucks :/
